entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AnalyzerRunner throws an Exception: Missing assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild.BuildHost' #70139
  • Roslyn shows a false error for an interceptor attribute when pathmap is used #70138
  • Strange output for NormalizeWhitespace for `1 is var i` #70135
    Backlog
  • Adding .editorconfig as a `<Compile>` item results in Roslyn exceptions that propagate through the project system #70134

Closed

  • Collection expressions: Incorrect diagnostic reported for element conversion error with CollectionBuilder type #69980
    17.8
  • IDE0251 Incorrectly suggests readonly (problem area: inline arrays converting to spans) #70116
  • WRN_GeneratorFailedDuringGeneration isn't helpful without a StackTrace #48008
    17.8
  • 'Frozen Partial' semantics need to be reconciled with OOP and SourceGEnerators #63968
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localize "Not Applicable" #70144
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fall back to using .NET Core MSBuild if no VS is installed #70143
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.8] Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source #70133
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address test feedback #70130
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Set C# InteractiveWindow default to .NET Core #70127
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2277081 #70141
  • Alternate approach to checksums for @toddgrun #70140
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70142
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a struct enumerator for WeakList<T> #70075
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: verify element type when reporting conversion error to CollectionBuilder type #69981
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change completion sorting to use ArrayBuilder instead of SegmentedList #70103
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix 'make member readonly' with inline array fields #70118
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.8] Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always respond to the 'cycle through references' command #70126
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config file #70125
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.8 P3 #70124
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't recreate whole completion item upon calculation of properties. #70097
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70145
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow only ordinary member method calls to be intercepted #70120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PERF: CompletionService.MergeAndPruneCompletionLists doesn't need to always sort #70111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Initial implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Do not restrict to type argument list context when a name could resolve to a generic and a non-generic symbol #70122
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • [17.8] Handle 32bit Debug desktop in end-to-end test #70114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle constant `null`s in pointer pattern matching #70113
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged
  • Port accessibility fix for the text view control in lightbulb preview #70112
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
